des:
Quran Player is a simple way to listen to Padma Vibhushan recipient Maulana Wahiduddin Khan’s simple and contemporary English translation of the Quran. It is narrated by the English Actor Sean Barrett. Ask Alexa to start playing the English translation of the Quran from any of the 114 chapters, or you can ask for any specific verse from any specific chapter. Download and install Alexa app in your smartphone and enable Quran Player skill. This is an ideal companion to find a prompt reference from the Quran. Bedroom or kitchen, infuse every place with spiritual incense through Quran Player.

To use, simply say one of the following:

To Play Chapter You can say
“ Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter 10”
“ Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Yunus”
“ Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Jonah”

To Play Specific verse You can say
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter 10 verse 25”
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Yunus verse 25”
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Jonah verse 25”

To Play Chapter Starting from Specific verse You can say
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter 10 verse 25, and continue “
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Yunus verse 25, and continue “
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Chapter Jonah verse 25, and continue “

To Play Verse of the Day You can Say
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Play Verse of the day”

To Receive Free Spiritual Literature You can say
“Alexa ask Quran Player to email me Spiritual Literature”

To Know about our Skill You can Say
“Alexa ask Quran Player to Tell me About the Skill”

Note: If Alexa does not understands Arabic Name of the chapter Please use English Name or Number.
